cause.description:
Our Mission: To inspire community involvement and raise awareness for Parkinson’s Disease, that will fund research to ultimately find a cure.
1. Team Fox for Parkinson's Research
2. Dr. Craig Cady's stem cell research at Bradley University
3. Focus on a Cure Foundation National awareness and patient support programs
4. To be an example of a environmentally conscious organization to decresae the impact of environmental effects in the cause of parkinson's
cause.mission: Funding Parkinson's Reaearch and patient support and education for the following
cause.name: Focus on a Cure Foundation for Parkisnon's
